about_the_game:
TrophyRC is an exciting off-road simulation game featuring radio-controlled models, where you can test your driving skills and explore new horizons.

Extreme Off-Roading: Challenge your skills on complex tracks filled with obstacles and rough terrain. Each race tests your precision and attention to detail — remember, speed isn’t everything here!



Key Features: Tracks for Every Taste: Head out onto meticulously designed tracks where every turn and obstacle will test your expertise.

Open World: Explore vast territories, discover uncharted routes, and enjoy true freedom of movement.



Vehicle Customization: Personalize your car by modifying technical parameters such as suspension, engine, and transmission. Change your car's appearance to stand out on the track or simply express your individuality.

Multiplayer: Join friends or other players from around the world. Participate in races, organize competitions, or just explore the world together.

Realistic Physics: We strive to offer highly detailed driving physics that considers all the specifics and nuances of each track section and surface. You can connect a radio control transmitter for an authentic experience.
